content: I think it's called an "electromagnetic pulse generator". I could be wrong but I don't think there is a way to create a bomb as we know the "bomb" that generates a magnetic pulse besides an atomic warhead. You might be able to create a EMP Generator to go off at a specific time and point it at a specific target but the worst you could do is cause all off the electronics to burn out. Bomb? No. It would be a great device for an attack but the setup would be difficult and the machine would be seriously bulky. Power to supply this device would be a serious consideration as well. A standard off the shelf "atomic" bomb would create an electromagnetic pulse that would perform the same function yet it would destroy all the structures and poison the well. Quantum materiae materietur marmota monax si marmota monax materiam possit materiari?
